"Ugh...Well it's 5 so I might as well."
He pulled off the main road and into the scales, other trucks just drove by. Sam shrugged and slowed to a stop. He waited for a while, but when he saw there was no attendent and that there was a sign in the window of the office saying that the scales were being repaired he grumbled and began to drive back out onto the main road. As he did a bright flash of light filled the cab of the rig.
"What the hell is that?!"

"Umm...yeah..."

"Mayor Tomas Conner"

He slowly entered and closed the door behind him. He turned around and, was again, in shock. Before him was a massive man of about 28 or 30. He had dirty blond hair, a very cute, boyish face, and quite possible the biggest body Sam had ever seen. The guy had to weigh over 500 pounds! Not only that he was clad only in a huge pair of briefs.
"Uhh...I'm Sam..."
